meanings.definition: Crushed or smashed into a soft, pulpy mass.
meanings.sent1: The mashed banana was easy to spread on the bread.
meanings.sent2: The mashed potatoes were fluffy and delicious.
meanings.sent3: The mashed avocado looked like green fluffy clouds.
meanings.sent4: The mashed peas resembled a colorful painting on the plate.
meanings.sent5: The mashed pumpkin had a velvety texture that melted in my mouth.

meanings.definition: Mixed or beaten until smooth and creamy.
meanings.sent1: The mashed ingredients created a creamy sauce for the pasta.
meanings.sent2: The mashed chickpeas made a smooth hummus dip.
meanings.sent3: The mashed eggs were so smooth they could slide off the plate.
meanings.sent4: The mashed butter and sugar blended perfectly in the cake batter.
meanings.sent5: The mashed tofu had a silky texture that coated the taste buds.
